body:
File: src/compiler/js-typed-lowering.cc
Symbol: JSTypedLowering::ReduceJSEqual / ReduceJSStrictEqual
Excerpt: JSTypedLowering::ReduceJSEqual folds many typed cases. Important snippet: if (r.OneInputIs(Type::NullOrUndefined())) { RelaxEffectsAndControls(node); node->RemoveInput(...); node->TrimInputCount(1); NodeProperties::ChangeOp(node, simplified()->ObjectIsUndetectable()); return Changed(node); }
Context: [JSTypedLowering, JSEqual, ObjectIsUndetectable, folded-to-unary]
Explanation: This records the TurboFan typed lowering that turns x == null/undefined into ObjectIsUndetectable(x). This is the lowering that preceding passes (like MachineLowering/TurboShaft/Maglev) will see and may attach protector dependencies for.
FileLine: "compiler/js-typed-lowering.cc:909-968"
explanation: Shows where JSEqual is converted into ObjectIsUndetectable in JSTypedLowering.
